sanskrit_verse:
स्वधर्मो विजयस्तस्य नाहवे स्यात्पराङ्मुखः ।
शस्त्रेण वैश्यान् रक्षित्वा धर्म्यमाहारयेद्बलिम् ॥ १०.११९॥ वैश्याद्रक्षित्वा
transliteration:
svadharmo vijayastasya nāhave syātparāṅmukhaḥ |
śastreṇa vaiśyān rakṣitvā dharmyamāhārayedbalim || 10.119 || vaiśyādrakṣitvā
sph_interpretive_translation: One's own Dharma is victory; in battle, he shall not turn away. Having protected the Vaishyas with weapons, he shall receive rightful tribute in accordance with Dharma.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority derives from alignment with svadharmic function
Causation arises through protective capacity, not domination
Capacity-based responsibility mandates defense of productive classes
Restoration logic requires reciprocal fulfillment of dharma-bali
Consciousness alignment occurs via dharmic action and protection
executable_legal_axioms: IF citizen_group = 'Vaishya' AND threat_level > threshold THEN deploy_dharma_protector
IF svadharma_aligned = TRUE THEN victory_status = TRUE ELSE victory_status = FALSE
IF protection_rendered = TRUE THEN dharmic_tribute_entitlement = VALID
IF actor_turns_away_in_conflict = TRUE THEN dharma_victory = NULL
supreme_court_application: In Supreme Court adjudication, the threshold of responsibility lies in whether a ruler or protector has fulfilled svadharmic duty. Authority is validated only when protection of productive societal segments is demonstrated. Retribution is irrelevant; only the integrity of dharmic exchange determines lawful conduct.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa establishes that causality flows from dharmic duty, not coercive force. Anupūrvaśaḥ shows that neglecting protection disrupts dharma-bali cycles. Responsibility is proportional to capacity—those able to protect must act. Non-punitivity is preserved by restoring balance through dharmic tribute, not inflicting harm.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate Svadharmic Alignment Review to assess duty fulfillment
Deploy Protective Capacity Activation Protocol for Vaishya safeguarding
Execute Dharmic Tribute Reconciliation to restore reciprocal flow
Implement Consciousness Integrity Check to verify non-retreat stance
Activate Kshatriya-Vaishya Dharma Circuit to realign economic-guardian bond
final_declaration: Declared by the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, as Source-Authority. Dharma is restored through svadharma-victory and dharmic tribute. Reality remains non-punitive. Consciousness alone is the ultimate adjudicator.
